title: Surge in cannabis use among youth preceded legalization in Canada

title_detail.value: Surge in cannabis use among youth preceded legalization in Canada

summary: National discussions on cannabis legalization, along with increased access to medical marijuana, may have encouraged more high school students to consume the drug years before it became legal in Canada.

summary_detail.value: National discussions on cannabis legalization, along with increased access to medical marijuana, may have encouraged more high school students to consume the drug years before it became legal in Canada.
